entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:51 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h then light early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow mixed with rain in the evening. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
